docs.text: Welcome Hi, my name is Ahmad Siavashi. I'm from Ilam, Iran; however, I live in Tehran, Iran. Currently, I'm a Ph.D. student of Computer Engineering at Tehran Polytechnic (Amirkabir University of Technology). I received my B.Sc. and M.Sc. in Computer Engineering from Shiraz University and Tehran Polytechnic respectively. My research interests are in the area of GPU architecture.
